serviceData.title: Your Trusted Roofing Partner in [location]
serviceData.p: Stephanie Romo Roofing delivers honest, dependable workmanship across a full range of roofing and exterior services. We treat your home like our own and stand behind every job.

lists.title: Gutter cleaning
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Keep water flowing freely and protect your roof and siding with professional gutter cleaning from Stephanie Romo Roofing.
lists.h2: Prevent Water Damage with Clean Gutters
lists.p2: Routine gutter cleaning removes leaves, debris, and blockages that can cause roof leaks, fascia rot, and foundation issues. Schedule seasonal cleanouts with our trained team. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Autumn leaf build-up | Spring thaw debris | Pre-storm maintenance | Preventing ice dams | Home maintenance schedules | Two-story homes
lists.seoContent:
Gutter Cleaning Services

Regular gutter cleaning is a simple, cost-effective step to protect your roof and foundation. Our crew clears gutters, checks downspouts, and ensures water moves away from your home to reduce the risk of leaks and structural damage. We provide timed appointments, debris hauling, and post-service checks so you can rest easy. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: New roof installation
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Expert new roof installation for homes of all sizes—quality materials, precise installation, and clear timelines from start to finish.
lists.h2: Start Fresh with a New Roof
lists.p2: When its time for a new roof, we help you choose materials and styles that match your home and budget. Our installations follow local building codes and industry best practices. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: New construction | Home additions | Replacing old roofing | Upgrading curb appeal | Energy-efficient roof systems | Warranty-backed installations
lists.seoContent:
New Roof Installation

We manage new roof installations from the initial estimate to the final inspection. Our team works with asphalt shingles, metal roofing, and composite systems, prioritizing ventilation, underlayment quality, and flashing details that ensure long-term performance. We coordinate with homeowners for color and style selection and provide a clear project timeline. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: Roof replacement
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. When repairs won't do, our roof replacement service restores protection and value with durable materials and professional craftsmanship.
lists.h2: Complete Roof Replacement You Can Rely On
lists.p2: We evaluate the existing deck and structure, remove old materials safely, and install a new roof system that meets modern performance and waterproofing standards. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Widespread shingle failure | Persistent leaks | Storm or hail damage | Multiple patched sections | Outdated roofing materials
lists.seoContent:
Roof Replacement Services

Roof replacement is a major investment—our team makes it straightforward. We assess ventilation, insulation, and deck condition, remove failing materials, and install a new system with quality underlayment and flashings. We'll assist with insurance documentation for storm damage and provide clear warranties on workmanship. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: Siding installation
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Improve energy efficiency and curb appeal with professional siding installation using vinyl, fiber cement, or engineered wood options.
lists.h2: Protect and Beautify Your Home Exterior
lists.p2: Our siding installation focuses on proper flashing, moisture barriers, and tight trims to prevent water intrusion and improve insulation performance. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Fresh exteriors | Energy upgrades | Style refreshes | Replacing damaged cladding | Adding insulation-backed siding
lists.seoContent:
Siding Installation

Correct siding installation is essential for weather resistance and long-term performance. We install a range of siding products with attention to flashing, trim, and finished details so your home looks great and stays dry. Our crews handle color selection, trim work, and seamless transitions to windows and doors. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: Siding replacement
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. When siding is beyond repair, we remove and replace it professionally to restore protection and resale value.
lists.h2: Full Siding Replacement with Lasting Results
lists.p2: We remove damaged panels, inspect the sheathing, and install new siding with updated moisture barriers and proper flashing. Choose modern materials that reduce maintenance and enhance protection. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Rot or mold | Warping or cracking | Repeated paint failure | Large hail or storm damage | Persistent drafts and energy loss
lists.seoContent:
Siding Replacement Services

Siding replacement can dramatically improve a home's performance and appearance. Our technicians evaluate the underlying structure, recommend materials such as fiber cement or premium vinyl, and complete the installation with industry-standard fastening and sealing. We ensure clean job sites and proper disposal of old materials. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: Roof inspection
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Detailed roof inspections to catch issues early, help with insurance claims, or prepare your home for sale.
lists.h2: Thorough Roof Inspections for Peace of Mind
lists.p2: Our inspections cover shingles, flashings, gutters, attic ventilation, and decking condition. We provide written reports with photos and recommended next steps. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Pre-listing inspections | Post-storm assessments | Routine maintenance checks | Insurance documentation | Seasonal tune-ups
lists.seoContent:
Comprehensive Roof Inspections

A professional roof inspection identifies small problems before they become expensive repairs. We document issues, note remaining shingle life, and advise on repairs, reroofing, or full replacement. Our reports help homeowners and insurance adjusters understand the true condition of the roof. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: Roof repair
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Fast, reliable roof repairs to stop leaks, replace damaged shingles, and restore integrity after storm or wear.
lists.h2: Quick Repairs to Stop Leaks and Protect Your Home
lists.p2: We focus on targeted repairs that extend roof life—replacing damaged shingles, fixing flashing, sealing penetrations, and addressing ventilation problems. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Leak patches | Flashing replacement | Shingle replacement | Chimney and skylight seals | Vent and soffit repairs
lists.seoContent:
Roof Repair Services

Timely repairs can prevent water intrusion and more costly deterioration. Our technicians locate leaks, replace failing components, and apply durable materials so repairs blend with the existing roof. We prioritize clear estimates and fast scheduling to minimize interior damage risk. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: Reroofing
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Reroofing services to update your existing roof system efficiently—better protection without full structural replacement.
lists.p2: Reroofing refreshes the weatherproof layer while evaluating decking and insulation. We recommend the right scope—repair, overlay, or full tear-off—based on condition and code. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Multiple worn layers | Surface aging | Budget-conscious upgrades | Improving curb appeal | Short-term life extension
lists.seoContent:
Reroofing Services

Reroofing can be a cost-effective alternative to full tear-off when the structure is sound. Our team inspects the deck, ensures proper ventilation, and installs a new roof layer per local regulations. We discuss pros and cons of overlays versus full replacements so you can choose the best long-term solution. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: Siding repair
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Prompt siding repairs to patch damage, stop moisture intrusion, and match existing finishes for a seamless look.
lists.p2: From localized panel replacement to trim and corner fixes, we repair siding to restore weather resistance and appearance. Moisture tests and flashing fixes are included when needed. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Cracked or warped panels | Loose trim | Water infiltration points | Caulking and sealant renewal | Paint touch-ups or replacement panels
lists.seoContent:
Siding Repair Services

Minor siding damage can lead to major problems if left unattended. Our specialists repair and replace damaged sections, verify sheathing integrity, and seal transitions to windows and doors. We work with multiple siding types to ensure color and texture match for a clean finish. Call Us At [phone]

lists.title: Skylight installation
lists.description: Call Us At [phone]. Add natural light and ventilation with professional skylight installation—watertight flashing and precise trimming guaranteed.
lists.p2: We install fixed and venting skylights with careful attention to flashing, insulation, and interior finishes to prevent leaks and drafts. Choose energy-efficient glazing options. Call Us At [phone]
lists.p3: Dark hallways and bathrooms | Attic ventilation | Natural light in lofts | Energy-efficient daylighting | Modern home upgrades
lists.seoContent:
Skylight Installation

Proper skylight installation requires exact flashing and sealing to prevent future leaks. Our team installs skylights designed for your roof pitch and integrates them with existing ventilation and insulation. We also offer replacement and repair for aging skylights to improve performance and reduce drafts. Call Us At [phone]
